name: Mesosphere
description:
Early Exit Games submission for Jame Gam 15 is a simple physics puzzle game where you control a marble in space as you make your way towards the dimensional door.

The jam theme was "No Going Back" and the special object was "Door". The game strayed slightly from its initial premise of not being able to retread areas you've been as the ability to jump, climb objects, and roll uphill made it more fun.

It features 3 short levels.
